Uses of Class
org.opensextant.geodesy.Topocentric2DPoint

Packages that use Topocentric2DPoint
Package
Description
org.opensextant.geodesy
An API for working with Geographical coordinates.

  • Uses of Topocentric2DPoint in org.opensextant.geodesy

    Subclasses of Topocentric2DPoint in org.opensextant.geodesy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Topocentric3DPoint
    The Topocentric3DPoint class extends the simple Topocentric2DPoint class by adding an explicit elevation value, in meters.
    Methods in org.opensextant.geodesy that return Topocentric2DPoint
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull Topocentric2DPoint
    PolarStereographic.toPolarStereographic(Longitude lon, Latitude lat)
    This method converts geodetic (latitude and longitude) coordinates to Polar Stereographic projection (easting and northing) coordinates, according to the current ellipsoid and Polar Stereographic projection coordinates.
    Topocentric2DPoint
    TransverseMercator.toTransverseMercator(Longitude lon, Latitude lat)
    This method converts geodetic (latitude and longitude) coordinates to Transverse Mercator projection (easting and northing) coordinates, according to the current ellipsoid and Transverse Mercator projection coordinates.
    Methods in org.opensextant.geodesy with parameters of type Topocentric2DPoint
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Topocentric2DPoint.equals(Topocentric2DPoint that)
    This method is used to test whether two points are equal in the sense that have the same coordinate value.
